[
    Token {
        kind: OpenTag(
            Full,
        ),
        span: (
            1,
            1,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Backtick,
        span: (
            3,
            1,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: StringPart(
            "Hello, ",
        ),
        span: (
            3,
            2,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Variable(
            "name",
        ),
        span: (
            3,
            2,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: Backtick,
        span: (
            3,
            14,
        ),
    },
    Token {
        kind: SemiColon,
        span: (
            3,
            15,
        ),
    },
]
